## RectsPacker.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `RectsPacker` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(width: number, height: number, maxBins?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | number | width of image bin |
|  height | number | height of image bin |
|  maxBins | number | _(Optional)_ max count of image bins |
